welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Erkner, a charming city known for its lakes, forests, and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take time to discover all the beauty and culture this city has to offer. Happy exploring!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Berlin-Schoenefeld Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Berlin-Schoenefeld Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal building at Berlin Brandenburg Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal building at Berlin Brandenburg Airport, primarily used for low-cost and regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Handles domestic and international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Main terminal for international flights, with a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: Serves as a hub for low-cost carriers, with a smaller selection of amenities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a 4-hour time limit per device.
